NTR plot: blackmail/forced/rape/despair 👍
@redgon1998 take it easy it's just a drawing

Poor MC-kun on the first one.

The girl deserved it tho. She has a guy who she knew for most of her life, is nice and supportive, but then falls and goes to bed with a guy that just beat up some thugs once (and didn't actually, but that part she didn't know). What a bitch.

The story in the omake makes no fucking sense. Chisato is such a stupid bitch. At first I thought she was getting blackmailed but she is just dumb beyond belief. She just got tricked by the gyaru-oh piece of shit into becoming a cum dumpster under the pretext that he would explain to kareshi-kun that she cheating on him was a fucking joke, or so I understood. I know that this is NTR (it's just about making the reader -and MC- feel bad, angry), but having Chisato be this dumb is beyond ridiculous. I mean, the gyaru-oh bastard tricked her once, and now twice? For fuck's sake, how stupid can this plot be?. It's good that it seemed that she was about to get busted in the last panel (but too bad we could not see what would happen next), just when she decided in her mind to "confess" everything she had done and tell Subaru that she still "loved" him. More so when she was getting ahead of herself by making plans to prepare Subaru's favorite dish (as a form of reconciliation, I guess)
Animation was meh. Kinda sad.  But, it did its job and made me wanna check out the source material.  I'll be glad when it's translated!
Sadly another mangaka with amazing artstyle wasted on NTR and rape stories. It's a shame

Why is this author or any others writing NTR genre not using police their doujins will still work even if police were used. But they're good to use for Endings...Tbh i'm so tired of these kinds of shit where the girl's despair never ends. Can't the author write different varieties of endings? Seriously it's like every NTR genre authors ran out of ideas for endinga of their series.
